isis.stitle: DT/DTI-466 A and B Series DT/DTI/DTA-466 C Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1993) - ENGINE PERFORMANCE ANALYSIS GUIDES - ENGINE TEST NOMENCLATURE - EXHAUST BACK PRESSURE

svcproc.title: EXHAUST BACK PRESSURE
svcproc.para: Exhaust back pressure is the measurement of the restriction introduced by the exhaust piping. Excessive restriction will create high back pressure, a rise in engine temperature, shorten valve life and lower horsepower. The measurement is taken in mm or inches of water. The Pressure Test Kit (ZTSE-2239 or D-200) or water manometer can be used for this test.
